movie.title: Mississippi Burning
movie.plot: Two FBI agents investigating the murder of civil rights workers during the 60s seek to breach the conspiracy of silence in a small Southern town where segregation divides black and white. The younger agent trained in FBI school runs up against the small town ways of his partner, a former sheriff.

events.title: James Chaney, Andrew Goodman and Michael Schwerner are murdered
